problem.title: The Challenge We're Solving
problem.subtitle: Why students are struggling with career decisions
problem.description: The decline in student enrollment in government degree colleges is not a consequence of poor infrastructure or lack of teaching resources. At the heart of the problem lies a critical gap in awareness.
points: Students don't understand the importance of graduation and career opportunities
Confusion about subject streams (Arts, Science, Commerce) after Class 10 or 12
Lack of awareness about degree programs in nearby government colleges
Uncertainty about jobs or higher studies after choosing a course
Unclear whether pursuing graduation is worth the effort
problem.impact: This lack of clarity leads to poor academic decisions, dropouts, or migration to private institutions that often promise but fail to deliver quality education.
